alert.note: Alert for Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...An area of training heavy showers will impact portions of Scotland and southeastern Richmond Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of training heavy showers near Hamlet, or 10 miles east of Rockingham, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Periods of heavy rain from training storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Multiple rounds of heavy rainfall may lead to localized ponding on the roadways especially in poor drainage locations. Locations impacted include... Laurinburg, Maxton, Hoffman, Gibson, East Laurinburg, Laurel Hill and Sandhills Game Land. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
